name: hl7connector
description: This is a class definition of HL7 data connector.

image_tag.description: test docker image tag to render in yaml

yamlData:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hl7connector
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hl7connector
  template:
    metadata:
      name: hl7connector
      labels:
        app: hl7connector
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: hl7connector
          image: "wolfganghuse/hl7connector:{{ .Parameters.image_tag }}"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
            - containerPort: 8000
---
kind: Service
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: hl7connector-svc
spec:
  selector:
    app: hl7connector
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      name: hl7connector
      port: 9000
      targetPort: 8000
    - protocol: TCP
      name: incoming-port
      port: 5000
      targetPort: 5000
